com.rattat.micro.game.frog
Class ScreenChooser

java.lang.Object
  com.rattat.micro.game.frog.ScreenChooser

public class ScreenChooser
extends java.lang.Object

Simple class for choosing which screen to display. Rather than passing around a midlet instance, pass this around instead. Safer.

Author:
william@rattat.com

          The game board

          The game won screen
 
Constructor Summary

          Creates a new instance of ScreenChooser Takes FroggerMIDLet as a parameter - used for actually displaying the appropriate Displayables
 
Method Summary

          Display a particular screen must be one of the SCREEN_XXX variables

displayScreen

public void displayScreen(int name)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
Display a particular screen must be one of the SCREEN_XXX variables

int - name Name of screen to display
